p: Territory of Washington County of Lincoln }ss To Frank Beardon Henry Beardon, O.J. Royes, R.C. Welch, H. Portch, E. L. Portch. In the name of the United States you are hereby required to appear before the undersigned one of the Justice of the Peace Acting Coroner in and for the said county on the 25th day of December A.D. 1884 at 11 o'clock and at the house of S.L. Beardon to give evidence in the cause of death of S.L. Beardon. I give under my hand and seal at this 24th day of December A.D. 1884 G.W. Carpenter Justice of the Peace Acting Coroner
